{"id":813375173,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1664700333,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/813375173/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"47 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reformat(String s) {\n\tList<Character> nums = new ArrayList<Character>();\n\tList<Character> alph = new ArrayList<Character>();\n\n\tfor (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n\t\tif (Character.isDigit(s.charAt(i)))\n\t\t\tnums.add(s.charAt(i));\n\t\telse\n\t\t\talph.add(s.charAt(i));\n\t}\n\n\tif (Math.abs(nums.size() - alph.size()) > 1)\n\t\treturn \"\";\n\n\tStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n\tif (nums.size() >= alph.size()) {\n\t\tfor (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n\t\t\tsb.append(nums.get(i));\n\t\t\tif (i < alph.size())\n\t\t\t\tsb.append(alph.get(i));\n\t\t}\n\t}else{\n\t\tfor (int i = 0; i < alph.size(); i++) {\n\t\t\tsb.append(alph.get(i));\n\t\t\tif (i < nums.size())\n\t\t\t\tsb.append(nums.get(i));\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\treturn sb.toString();\n}\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string","has_notes":false}
